specs.name: zro huffing crisis
specs.Name: Zro Huffing Crisis
specs.Desc: Many of our pops have taken to inhaling zro reactionally. Widespread dependence means many have come to identify with the mystical hallucinations it causes.
specs.brewingCrisisName: Zro Distillation contributes to Zro Huffing Crisis
specs.brewingCrisisDesc: With the advent of zro distillation, many of our citizens are experimenting with zro huffing.
